rpc.statistics
Interface HypothesisTest

All Known Implementing Classes:
ChiSquareTest, CMHTest
public interface HypothesisTest

Hypothesis test interface for statistical tests of independence.

Method Summary
 StatisticResults getStatistic()
          All hypothesis tests must be able to compute a statistic results object consisting of the test statistic, p-value, sample size, and strength of effect.
 

Method Detail

getStatistic

StatisticResults getStatistic()
All hypothesis tests must be able to compute a statistic results object consisting of the test statistic, p-value, sample size, and strength of effect.

Returns:
the result of the statistical test.
